name: openenglishttutor
description: Multi-exam English preparation platform supporting IELTS, TOEFL, and YDS

scripts.dev: npm run build:shared && turbo run dev
scripts.dev:concurrent: npm run build:shared && concurrently "npm run dev:api" "npm run dev:web" --names "API,WEB" --prefix-colors "blue,green"
scripts.build: npm run build:shared && turbo run build
scripts.build:api: npm run build:shared && cd packages/api && npm run build
scripts.build:web: npm run build:shared && cd packages/web && npm run build
scripts.db:migrate: cd packages/api && npx prisma migrate dev
scripts.db:setup: npm run db:generate && npm run db:migrate && npm run db:seed
scripts.dev:api: npm run build:shared && cd packages/api && npm run dev
scripts.dev:web: npm run build:shared && cd packages/web && npm run dev
scripts.postinstall: npm run db:generate && npm run build:shared

author: OpenEnglishTutor Team
